page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT IN HAMBLEDON
page.content:
These are the main centres of employment in {Hambledon:}
{Name} {No. employed } Clarke's foodstore 2 (+7) London House antiques 2 The Bakery 2 (+7) Post Office and Newsagent 1 (+4) Lott's General Store 2 Hambledon Garage 6 The George Inn 2 The New Inn 2 The Vine public house 2 (+8) The Bat and Ball public house 6 (+19) Hartridge Soft Drinks factory 40-45 Lloyd's Bank (2) Hambledon County First School 6 (+1) Miller's Insurance Brokers 2 Hambledon Vineyard 2 Glidden Farm 6 Rushmere Farm 2 { Part-timers shown in brackets.
